name: Sevana Trades
overview:
Established in the year 1998, we, “Sevana Trades and Services Pvt. Ltd.”, are an ISO 9001:2008 certified organization engaged in manufacturing, suppling and trading a wide gamut of Tea Processing & Packaging Machines, Weighers & Fillers, Consumables and Material Handling Equipment.

Product Portfolio: ISO 9001:2008 certified Sevana Trades and Services Pvt. Ltd. are one of the reputed organization engaged in manufacturing and trading a wide gamut of Tea Processing & Packaging Machines, Weighers & Fillers, Consumables and Material Handling Equipment. This range is designed and developed using qualitative raw material sourced from the famed vendors of the market.

Infrastructure: We have developed a sophisticated infrastructure facility, for having streamlined execution of all the business operations. Our infrastructure is segregated into various unit including manufacturing, quality testing and warehousing & packaging for having a systematic management of our facility. All these units are well equipped with latest machines and instruments, which are periodically upgraded, so as to have hassle-free and huge production process.

Team: Engineers & technicians Quality analysts Skilled & semi-skilled laborers Warehousing & packaging professionals Sales & marketing executives

Quality Assurance: We have been the first choice of our clients due to our ISO certified range of Tea Processing & Packaging Machines, Weighers & Fillers, Consumables and Material Handling Equipment. Our team of professionals are highly focused towards the quality of our products and manufacture this range as par the international quality parameters.

Client Satisfaction: With an objective to create a benchmark of success for ourselves in market, we are offering a ISO certified range of Tea Processing & Packaging Machines, Weighers & Fillers, Consumables and Material Handling Equipment.
